title: Dart trap
data:

The [[dart trap]] is the weakest [[trap]] in the game. It holds 3-11 [[dart]]s and fires when stepped upon, poisoning the target.

[[Repel Missiles#Player sources|Repel Missiles]] reduces the chance of this trap being able to hit the player.

Much like other traps, dart traps cannot be disarmed, but they do have a limited supply of ammunition. They are fairly uncommon, appearing only in the [[Ossuary]] branch and in the [[Tomb]].

==History==
*Dart traps were removed with all mechanical traps in [[0.27]].
*In [[0.24]], [[needle]]s were replaced with [[dart]]s, and dart traps were brought back.
*Prior to [[0.16]], traps could be disarmed by "attacking" the trap in place by pressing '''Ctrl-<Direction>'''. This was enhanced by the [[Traps (skill)|Traps]] skill, also removed in [[0.13]].
*[[Dart]]s and dart traps were removed in [[0.15]].
*Prior to [[0.13]], mechanical traps could spawn randomly through the dungeons.
